text: @realDonaldTrump Hope we get a working covid-19 treatment and Dow Jones above 30K by the end of 2020.  Really don't care about the trade deal or whathaveu, but a treatment is a must.  Vaccine, might take a while and crossing fingers that it may come out before winter 2021.
